item.description:
RAINY SUNDAY PIZZA BRUNCH



BEST EVER, BEST EVER, BEST EVER, BEST EVER, BEST EVER, BEST EVER...



PIZZA



A RAINY DAY EQUALS…

A PIZZA DAY AT THE FAMOUS…



PEPE PIZZA



Voted Best of 2008 Connecticut



Where: 233 Buckland Hills Drive

Manchester,Conn

860-644-7333

Across from the Buckland Hiills Mall



When: This Sunday ~ March 29th



Time: 1:00 PM For Lunch……… ( This way there are left overs for Dinner!!!!)



RSVP: To get an idea of how many folks, please send a RSVP, or questions:

Ira... 860-604-5792 cell ...... OR ...... Mistrchrming@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather in the front lobby area
